article_title: Bay District schools face substitute shortage

article_metadata.description: Schools in Bay County face a shortage of substitute teachers, forcing regular teachers to sometimes give up their planning time to fill in.
article_metadata.author: COLLIN BREAUX

og.description: Schools in Bay County face a shortage of substitute teachers, forcing regular teachers to sometimes give up their planning time to fill in.
